publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5254 Brian Adam: Values Into Action (VIA) Scotland Launch—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Committee of Values Into Action (VIA) for recognising that it needs a distinct Scottish voice; commends VIA Scotland for working towards equality in society for people with learning difficulties, and wishes it every success following its launch on St Andrew’s Day.
S2M-5254 Values Into Action (VIA) Scotland Launch (lodged on 30 November 2006) Jackie Baillie*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, John Swinburne*
S2M-5254 Values Into Action (VIA) Scotland Launch (lodged on 30 November 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-5254 Values Into Action (VIA) Scotland Launch (lodged on 30 November 2006) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
